items.title: User Authentication System
items.summary: Implement secure user authentication with OAuth 2.0 and JWT token-based session management

items.title: Data Storage and Persistence Layer
items.summary: Implement scalable data storage with PostgreSQL for relational data and Redis for caching

items.title: REST API and GraphQL Gateway
items.summary: Implement unified API gateway supporting both REST and GraphQL protocols with rate limiting and authentication

items.title: Graph Database Integration for Knowledge Management
items.summary: Integrate Neo4j graph database for storing and querying knowledge graph with atoms, modules, and relationships

items.title: AI-Powered Impact Analysis and Code Review
items.summary: Integrate Claude AI for automated impact analysis, PR summarization, and reviewer recommendation

items.title: Authentication System Architecture
items.summary: System design for OAuth 2.0 and JWT-based authentication with token rotation and MFA support

items.summary: Detailed design for data persistence, caching strategy, and connection pooling

items.summary: API gateway design supporting both REST and GraphQL protocols with shared authentication and rate limiting

items.summary: Design for bidirectional sync between YAML files and Neo4j graph database with Cypher query patterns

items.title: AI-Powered Impact Analysis with Claude
items.summary: Design for Claude API integration following claude.md guidelines for PR analysis and impact scoring

items.title: Authentication Service Deployment
items.summary: Standard operating procedure for deploying authentication service updates to production

items.summary: Procedures for PostgreSQL and Redis backup, verification, and disaster recovery

items.summary: Procedure for deploying API gateway changes with zero downtime using blue-green deployment

items.summary: Procedure for synchronizing YAML atoms to Neo4j and performing routine database maintenance

items.summary: Procedure for running Claude-powered impact analysis on pull requests following claude.md guidelines

items.summary: Comprehensive test suite for authentication service including unit, integration, and security tests

items.summary: Test procedures to validate backup integrity and recovery processes

items.summary: Test plan for REST and GraphQL APIs including functional, performance, and security testing

items.summary: Role-based access control policy defining user roles, permissions, and authentication requirements

items.summary: Policy governing use of AI services (Claude API) including data privacy, PII handling, and compliance requirements

items.summary: Security risks related to authentication implementation including brute force, token theft, and OAuth vulnerabilities
